msg: Fix memory leak that prevents context.xml files associated with failed deployments from being deleted.
Fix errors uncovered once the above issue was resolved.

author: markt
msg: If a component is FAILED it will remain in the FAILED state while stop() is called
Better logging for Lifecycle issues for FailedContext

author: markt
msg: Prevent ClassCastException when undeploying a FailedContext
